author: iSazonov
body:
Check that we can register and change (Set-) remote endpoint
configurations with given PSVersion.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov Please add the `[Feature]` tag to the last commit message to verify whether the changes fix the test failure.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I will add the `[Feature]` tag to the last commit to trigger the full test run.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Restarted job on Travis-CI as one test failed due to intermittent failure.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Not taking for GA because this was caused by a change that is only in `master` branch

title: Fix PSVersion in PSSessionConfiguration tests
